class SpikeWizard.SpikeFinder(data, mode='auto', filter=True, function: Union[str, Callable] = 'gaussian', **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: object

This class is used to find the spikes in a given data. It uses the scipy.signal.find_peaks function to find the spikes.
